name: Banana Cake
description: A delicious banana cake.

name: Apple
description: A delicious red apple, free from any sort of sophoric poisons as far as you know.

name: Cheap Wine
description: A fine aged wine. You can't wait for the day to end so you can drink it.

name: Banana
description: A plain banana. It seems to be getting overly ripe more quickly than you would expect.

name: Beef Jerky
description: Standard soldier food, they don't even bother with an expiration date.

name: Bread Loaf
description: A boring loaf of bread. It's not even sliced.

name: Round of Cheese
description: Yes, a whole round of cheese. Where the heck are you keeping all this stuff?

name: Meat Pie
description: Piping hot and delicious, yet can be stuffed in your pocket and come out pristine.

name: Health Potion
description: A healing potion typical of high fantasy worlds, capable of healing wounds instantly.

name: Wooden Sword
description: A short wooden sword, capable of cutting even the mightiest of small bushes.

name: Wooden Dagger
description: A small wooden dagger, it's a real stretch to call this a weapon.

name: Iron Sword
description: An iron sword, stronger than a wooden sword but weaker than a steel sword.

name: Iron Dagger
description: An iron dagger, stronger than a wooden dagger but weaker than a steel dagger.

name: Steel Sword
description: A mighty weapon once wielded by a local tyrant.

name: Steel Dagger
description: This dagger is incredibly sharp. Like seriously, be careful.

name: Leather Armor
description: A classic set of leather armor, complete with gauntlets and boots. Stylish, yet functional.

name: Hardened Leather Armor
description: This leather armor is protective but lets you move freely. It has been dyed black to blend with shadows.

name: Iron Armor
description: Armor made from iron, stronger than leather but weaker than steel.

name: Steel Armor
description: Armor made from steel, proof against all but the strongest of attacks.

name: Cell Key
description: The key to open the dungeon cells.

name: Officers' Key
description: The key to open the castle's armory and weaponry.

name: Advisor's Office Key
description: The key to open the castle advisor's office.

name: Mage's Office Key
description: The key to open the mage's office.

name: Lord's Guard Key
description: The key to open the nobles' quarters.

name: Keep Key
description: The key to open the castle's keep.

name: Gate Key
description: The key to getting out of this hell hole.

name: Odd Key
description: What is this key for? You have no idea where you got it from, but you refuse to part with it because it could come in handy some day.

name: Macguffin
description: This item will defeat the boss of the game and make you rich, but only after finishing your quest. Why? Because I said so.

name: Chekhov's Bow
description: According the the rules of storytelling, this Bow will be important later. Probably.

name: Portrait of Sue Hannum, Giver of Good Grades
description: A beautiful portrait of the patron saint of the Advanced Java class.
